text: 15.29 Wkp 17.14, Apo 15.20, 21.25, Lep 2.14, 2.20 Binɨb ogɨnap, sab chag tap yepɨs ogɨnap sɨbogɨnɨg pakenɨgel, ma ñɨŋɨnɨmɨb agɨlak. Kuŋam tɨg wukel kumek, nɨkɨm sek yenɨgab tek ma ñɨŋɨnɨmɨb agɨlak. Kuŋam tɨkem, nɨkɨm amdek nep ñɨŋɨnɨmɨb agɨlak. Sab chag tap okok nɨkɨm ak ma ñɨŋɨnɨmɨb agɨlak. Bin si bɨ si ma gɨnɨmɨb agɨlak. Tap apun anɨb okok asɨk tep gɨnɨgabɨm ak, tep yɨbɨl agɨlak. Takaw anɨb ak agjupun. Tep agɨl tɨkɨlak.
